title: Role of water in vapor permeation through graphene oxide membrane
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00462K, Paper
choonsoo Kim, Byeongho Lee
Membranes with atomic-level pores or constrictions are valuable for separation processes. Among these, graphene oxide (GO) membranes represent an emerging new class of separation membranes with unique ballistic and selective...
